import React from 'react' import "../ComponentStyles/Rightbar.css" import {Users} from "../dummyData" import Online from './Online' export default function Rightbar({ user }) { const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const HomeRightbar=()=>{ return( <>
{" "} Usama and 3 other friends have a birthday today!

Online Friends

    {Users.map((u)=>( ))}
) } const ProfileRightbar=()=>{ return ( <>

Veteran Information

City: {user.city}
From: {user.from}
Relationship: {user.relationship ===1 ? "Single" : user.relationship ===2 ? "Married" : "-" }

User Friends

John Carter
John Carter
John Carter
John Carter
) } return (
{user? :}
) }
